Hi {!Opportunity.Contact_First_Name__c},
Thanks again for choosing to optimize your business with BigCommerce! Here are the next steps for taking advantage of your special offers from our Optimize Kit with Intuit QuickBooks.
1. Pick out your FREE premium template
Please take a look at our premium templates to find one you like. They’re all mobile friendly and have SEO built right in to help your search rankings. A BigCommerce expert will help you apply one of the following templates:
Health & Beauty https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme/health-and-beauty/
Bright & Bold https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme/bright-bold/
Sugar & Mint https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme/sugar-mint/
Dusk & Dawn https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme/dusk-dawn/
Cookies & Cream https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme/cookies-cream/
California https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme/california/
Ohio https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme/ohio/
Hawaii https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme/hawaii/
Connecticut https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme/connecticut/
Alaska https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme/alaska/
Indiana https://www.bigcommerce.com/theme/indiana/
2. Call us at 844-632-8914 to get assistance with setting up your store
Our experts are ready to help you with:
Applying your premium template
Setting up QuickBooks for your payments and help you find the QuickBooks Online Integration App
Configuring shipping, taxes, SSL, domain and other settings
Stocking your products (options, SKUs, rules, categories)
Just call 844-632-8914 to get started.
If you’re currently migrating your online store to BigCommerce, we can still work on some setup items now and then finish up when your migration is complete. Please email migrations@bigcommerce.com with any questions you have about your migration.
3. Optimize your business!
After that, you’ll be all set to sell your products online, optimize and grow your business and turn online shoppers into loyal customers.
We’re looking forward to helping you get started on BigCommerce,
The BigCommerce Team
844-632-8914
